alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 9:04PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...THUNDERSTORMS WITH STRONG WIND GUSTS WILL IMPACT WESTERN SWEET GRASS AND CENTRAL PARK COUNTIES THROUGH 945 PM MDT... At 902 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 18 miles east of Toston to 22 miles southwest of Livingston. Movement was northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Travel on Interstate 90 through Livingston will be impacted by sudden cross winds. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Clyde Park, Chico Hot Springs, Pine Creek, Chico, Wilsall, and Emigrant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Crazy Mountains; Livingston Area; Northern Park; Paradise Valley
